sentences.english: The Longman Chinese Reader Series is written for Primary School students, focusing on the development of oral skills.
sentences.chinese: 《朗文小樹繪本叢書》爲幫助小學生學習口語而編寫。

sentences.english: The Longman logo, a small sailing ship, is on the cover of this book.
sentences.chinese: 本書的封面上印有朗文公司的小帆船標誌。

sentences.english: The Longman Grammar of Spoken and Written English is an entirely new grammar…
sentences.chinese: 《朗文英語口語和筆語語法》由英國的拜伯等人編著。

sentences.english: The new edition of Longman dictionary is printing.
sentences.chinese: 朗文詞典的新版本正在被印刷。

sentences.english: This one is published by Longman.
Longman opened its office in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 朗文在香港開設分公司。

sentences.english: I wonder if you can lend me your Longman Dictionary of Contemporary English for a couple of days。
sentences.chinese: 不知道能否將《朗文當代英語詞典》借給我用幾天？

definition: dictionary/also written 辭典|辞典[ci2 dian3]/CL:部[bu4],本[ben3]
dictionary/also written 詞典|词典[ci2 dian3]/CL:本[ben3],部[bu4]
English Language Teaching (ELT)/studying and teaching English
TOEIC (Test of English for International Communication)
